did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: New York State Community Theater Journal Collection1999-2006
did.abstract: Collection is made up of the New York State Community Theater Journal.

origination.corpname: State University of New York at Albany

did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: M. E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University at Albany, SUNY

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The New York State Community Theater Journal was first published in December of 1960. It was a joint publication from SUNY Albany and the New York State Community Theater Association. The NYSCTA was a representative of local theater in the state until 1987 when it was combined with the New York State Theatre Festival Association.

The periodical was used as the newsletter for the Association, consisting of news for the group and its members, as well as local theater news. It would also include articles about theater history, treating this as an educational journal for those interested in theater.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the publication of the New York State Community Theater Journal dating from the years 1960 to 1971. Information on local productions as well as those taking part in them can be found in these volumes. There are some select volumes missing from the collection but the majority of the pieces are in the collection.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were donated to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: This page may contain links to digital objects. Access to these images and the technical capacity to download them does not imply permission for re-use. Digital objects may be used freely for personal reference use, referred to, or linked to from other web sites.
Researchers do not have permission to publish or disseminate material from these collections without permission from an archivist and/or the copyright holder.

The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming to the laws of copyright. Some materials in these collections may be protected by the U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) and/or by the copyright or neighboring-rights laws of other nations. More information about U.S. Copyright is provided by the Copyright Office. Additionally, re-use may be restricted by terms of University Libraries gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks.
The University Archives are eager to hear from any copyright owners who are not properly identified so that appropriate information may be provided in the future.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, the New York State Community Theater Journal Collection, 1960-1971. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the New York State Community Theater Journal Collection).
